This balm leaves my beard softer than any other. Give a whole new meaning to “Fluffy Beard”. I’ve tried the other scents but they’re way to strong. Unscented is definitely the way to go Review Title: Love this Unscented balm Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: NATUREALLY YOU - Beard Balm - Campfire Cody Scent - (2 oz) - Condition, Smooth, Soften, Tame, Remove Beard Itch Review Date: 2018/02/10 Store: NATUREALLY YOU Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Liquid Volume': '2 Fluid Ounces', 'Brand': 'NATUREALLY YOU', 'Unit Count': '2.0 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 0.65 inches'} Review Text: Scent: Campfire Cody
Smells like: Roasted Marshmallows

Love this balm! This balm leaves my beard softer than any other. Give a whole new meaning to “Fluffy Beard”. I’ve tried the other scents but they’re way to strong. Unscented is definitely the way to go Review Title: Unscented is the way to go! Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: NATUREALLY YOU - Beard Balm - The Outlaw Scent - (2 oz) - Condition, Smooth, Soften, Tame, Remove Beard Itch Review Date: 2018/02/10 Store: NATUREALLY YOU Average Rating: 3.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'NATUREALLY YOU', 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Unit Count': '2.0 Ounce', 'Liquid Volume': '2 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '2.4 x 2.4 x 0.8 inches; 2.4 Ounces'} Review Text: Scent: The Outlaw

Love this balm! This balm leaves my beard softer than any other. Give a whole new meaning to “Fluffy Beard”. I’ve tried the other scents but they’re way to strong. Unscented is definitely the way to go Review Title: Unscented is the way to go! Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mr Bear Family Moustache Wax (30ml/1.01oz) - Made in Sweden (SCENT: Original) Review Date: 2018/03/23 Store: Mr Bear Family Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Liquid Volume': '30 Milliliters', 'Item Form': 'Wax', 'Brand': 'Mr Bear Family', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '2.2 x 2.2 x 0.5 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '753640935187'} Review Text: Great hold and great smell!

The only thing that let me down was the tin did not have the awesome label design like pictured. It has a goofy cartoony teddy bear face. Review Title: Great hold and great scent! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
This individual displays a clear preference for unscented grooming products, particularly for beard care items, as highlighted by consistently high ratings for unscented options. They demonstrate a strong inclination for products that condition and soften their beard, emphasizing natural feel and effectiveness over scent. While they tolerate some scented variants, such as Campfire Cody, they rate these lower than unscented options, suggesting a sensitivity to overpowering fragrances. 

Quality is a significant factor in their purchasing decisions, as evidenced by perfect scores for products that meet their performance expectations, particularly regarding softness and manageability. Their review of a moustache wax further indicates a search for products with strong hold and pleasing scent, although it diverges slightly from the unscented preference. 

Price sensitivity does not appear prevalent in this purchase history, as the focus leans more towards product effectiveness and satisfaction rather than cost. Overall, their core preferences revolve around effective, high-quality grooming solutions, with a strong bias towards unscented formulations and a keen eye for natural product benefits.
